Waveshare 1.54 inch

dev board Arduino UNO
firmware Arduino
chip ATmega328P
chip Waveshare
features e-paper e-ink SPI
e-paper version 1

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Waveshare e-paper

Buy the components

  1. Arduino UNO R3
  2. WaveShare 1.54in E-Ink module

Code

Download code waveshare-1in54-e-paper.ino

Makefile

Prototype

A photo of the actual setup.

Schematic

Wire up the hardware accordingly

Description

The 4 non-SPI pins are defined in epdif.h file:

#define RST_PIN         8
#define DC_PIN          9
#define CS_PIN          10
#define BUSY_PIN        7

The 2 SPI pins for Arduino UNO are defined as:

MOSI  11
MISO  12
SCK   13
